content:
From: Dominique Unruh <unruh@ut.ee>
Hi,

a minor thing: The NEWS file does not mention that the abbreviations
MAXIMUM and MINIMUM are gone.

Best wishes,
Dominique.

From: Florian Haftmann <florian.haftmann@informatik.tu-muenchen.de>
Hi Dominique,

a minor thing: The NEWS file does not mention that the abbreviations
MAXIMUM and MINIMUM are gone.

see http://isabelle.in.tum.de/repos/isabelle/rev/7e9269c188d6 as part of
the upcoming RC2.

Since none of these occured in the visible universe (distribution & AFP)
at that time, I took that as indicator to abolish it directly in one step.

Cheers,
Florian
